*****Here's how to code text that is unreadable or difficult to transcribe*****
Use the "damage" element for when some aspect of the text is difficult to read. Follow with the "unclear" and "supplied" in combination and make a reasonable guess for what's missing. Your reading should sit within the .. tagset. If you cannot read the text at all still provide the damage tag and follow it with a self-closing element leaving out the "supplied" element.
For Example:
your best guess here to what the text says
Explanation of Attributes
@unit values unit="word" unit="chars" unit="sentence" @quantity values in relation to the unit -- how many units are unclear @agent values agent="smudge" agent="blurred" agent="fold" agent="torn"
@resp resp="#yourInitials"
